title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Architecting and shipping full-stack applications, systems tools, and AI-integrated products. Leading open source projects across Rust, TypeScript, and Python ecosystems. Building developer tools that prioritize performance, correctness, and developer experience.

title: Full Stack Engineer

title: Software Developer
